headline: Western Digital Accelerates Storage Innovation for AI Era
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif. & NEW YORK, February 03, 2026--At its Innovation Day 2026, Western Digital (Nasdaq: WDC) today unveiled a new customer-centric storage roadmap that reinvents the hard drive for AI needs, reinforcing its position as a strategic storage infrastructure partner for the AI-driven data economy. headline: SanDisk and Western Digital are the Real AI Kings of 2026
summary: As investors turned their back on software (notably, the seat-based software-as-a-service companies), they’re turned towards hardware in a big-time way. You wouldn’t know it by looking at those flat shares of Nvidia (NASDAQ:NVDA), but the iShares Semiconductor ETF (NASDAQ:SOXX) is up around 13% year to date, with few signs of slowing down. The winners within ... SanDisk and Western Digital are the Real AI Kings of 2026

headline: Western Digital adds $4 billion to buyback plan as AI boosts memory chip sales
summary: Western Digital said on Tuesday its board has ​approved $4 billion more for share ‌repurchases, as demand for its memory chips ‌used in artificial intelligence servers surges.  Its shares rose about 5% in premarket trading, adding to a 57% jump ⁠this year.  A ‍global shortage of memory chips has intensified competition among AI and consumer electronics ​companies for limited supplies, driving up ‌prices and extending lead times as manufacturers struggle to ramp up capacity.

headline: Western Digital Authorizes Additional $4.0 Billion of Share Repurchases
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., February 03, 2026--Western Digital Corporation (Nasdaq: WDC) today announced that its Board of Directors has authorized an additional $4.0 billion for share repurchases by the company pursuant to its share purchase program. As of February 2, 2026, the company had approximately $484 million remaining under the prior share repurchase authorization. The additional repurchase authorization is effective immediately. Share repurchases may be made on the open market or in privately ne
